meanings.definition: A metal plate used to join the ends of two rails together.
meanings.sent1: The fishplate connected the two rails securely.
meanings.sent2: The workers installed the fishplate to link the railway tracks.
meanings.sent3: The fishplate decided to play matchmaker and bring the rails together.
meanings.sent4: The fishplate acted like a bridge, uniting the separate rails.
meanings.sent5: The shiny fishplate gleamed under the sun, holding the tracks in place.

meanings.definition: To fasten or repair with a fishplate.
meanings.sent1: They fishplated the broken rail back together.
meanings.sent2: He will fishplate the loose rail to make it secure.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic fishplated the rail with precision and skill.
meanings.sent4: She fishplated the connection, making it stronger than before.
meanings.sent5: Fishplating the rail was like giving it a metal hug to keep it intact.
